entry.title: Conversational Interfaces for Chatbots and Artificial Intelligence
entry.summary:
Description

Attendees will see concepts for conversational interfaces used to create chatbots, and python libraries and code used to create them. Conversational interfaces are increasingly becoming a preferred way for users to engage with information, offering a more personalized user experience. The ability to understand userâ€™s intent and take action makes it a good match for AI.
